Path: activesupport/lib/active_support/vendor/tzinfo-0.3.11/tzinfo/definitions/Africa/Harare.rb
Last Update: Thu Oct 23 19:39:06 -0500 2008

Source Code

require 'tzinfo/timezone_definition'

module TZInfo
  module Definitions
    module Africa
      module Harare
        include TimezoneDefinition
        
        timezone 'Africa/Harare' do |tz|
          tz.offset :o0, 7452, 0, :LMT
          tz.offset :o1, 7200, 0, :CAT
          
          tz.transition 1903, 2, :o1, 1932939531, 800
        end
      end
    end
  end
end
